atk1-text: Roll Current Swarms + TR and choose a hex up to 4 hexes away. Each insect within one hex of the chosen hex rolls SPE + SR, gaining Wounds for each net success. Lose one Swarms.
atk2-text: Roll KEN + TR vs. KEN + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. This move ignores Carapace.
atk3-text: Roll SPE + TR vs. SPE + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. On a success, you move up to your SPE.
atk4-text: Roll PAS + TR + Current Wounds vs. STR + SR against an adjacent insect. The target gains wounds equal to the net successes. On a success, advance self 1.
